title: Peekaboo Kids - Kids Game - Latest version for Android App Education
text: Peekaboo Kids - Kids Game A fun and educational game for kids 1-3 years old! App info Advertisement App description Android App Analysis and Review: Peekaboo Kids - Kids Game, Developed by Tappy Happy kids apps & games for kids. Listed in Education Category. Current Version Is v6q, Updated On 06/02/2023 . According to users reviews on Google Play: Peekaboo Kids - Kids Game. Achieved Over 1 million Installs. Peekaboo Kids - Kids Game Currently Has 2 thousand Reviews, Average Rating 3.8 Stars - A game for kids 1-3 years old!Welcome to Peekaboo Kids - a fun and educational game for children between the ages 1-3 years! In this English kids game you will get to meet a number of exciting animals, vehicles and music instruments, such as lion, cow, airplane and guitar. Peekaboo Kids is especially created for small children and includes over 80 fun animations and sound effects. When you click on an animal or a vehicle it gets animated and its special sound is played, for example a dog barking. An English voice will reveal the name of the animal or car displayed. Peekaboo Kids is a free game for kids 1, 2 or 3 years old. The game is divided into 6 different categories of animals and cars: - The Farm - The Forest - The Savannah - The Garage - The Music Scene - Guess the Item The interface is well defined, interactive and excellently designed to suit kids and toddlers 1 year, 2 years and 3 years old - all in English. Games for kids are a great way for the child and parent to have a fun time together, while learning about animals and cars. Toddlers quickly learn to use this application by themselves. LOTS OF DIFFERENT ANIMATIONS AND SOUNDS This game for kids includes over 80 animations and sound effects of animals and cars. All voices are in the English language. LEARN ANOTHER LANGUAGE Peekaboo Kids includes ten languages to choose from: English, French, Russian, Italian, Spanish, German, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish and Dutch. CAREFULLY TESTED The app has been carefully tested by toddlers 1, 2 and 3 years old. We believe all apps for kids should be tested on children during development. KEY FEATURES - Games for kids - Animations and sounds specifically chosen for kids and toddlers - Optimized for kids 1 year, 2 years and 3 years old - Carefully tested on both phones & tablets - Animals, cars, vehicles and music instruments. - Free to download! Peekaboo Kids is brought to you by Tappy Happy, creators of highly popular apps and games for kids 1, 2 and 3 years old. All our apps and games for kids are free and in English. We are currently offering last version updated 06/02/2023 . This is our latest, most optimized version. It is suitable for many different devices. Free download directly apk from the Google Play Store or other versions we're hosting. Moreover you can download without registration and no login required. We have more than 2000+ available devices for Samsung, Xiaomi, Huawei, Oppo, Vivo, Motorola, LG, Google, OnePlus, Sony, Tablet ... with so many options, itâ€™s easy for you to choose games or software that fit your device.
